sourcesContent: import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-home', templateUrl: './home.component.html', styleUrls: ['./home.component.css'], }) export class HomeComponent { selected_image: string = ''; selected_post: Post = { id: '', description: { _description: '' }, title: { _title: '' }, author: { _author: '' }, url: { _url: '' }, }; posts: Post[] = []; setImage(image: Post) { console.log(image); } async ngOnInit() { const response = fetch('https://localhost:44492/home', { method: 'GET' }); if (!(await response).ok) { throw new Error(`Error! status: ${(await response).status}`); } const result = (await response).json(); await result.then((result) => { this.posts = result; }); } } interface Post { id: string; description: Description; author: Author; title: Title; url: Url; } interface Description { _description: string; } interface Author { _author: string; } interface Title { _title: string; } interface Url { _url: string; }
